subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में किस अभिवासी किस्मत में है?
C_en: Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh
C_hi: सवाई महाराज सवाई शाही मन संगीत
explanation_en:
Hawa Mahal is a popular building in Jaipur known for its unique architecture.
